General.Name: CLERHP Estructuras S.A
General.Description: CLERHP Estructuras, S.A. engages in structural engineering and construction activities. It offers structure design, calculation, and building services. The company designs and builds government buildings, wind towers, condominiums, apartments, houses, bridges, hotels, and other buildings. CLERHP Estructuras, S.A. was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Murcia, Spain.
